string-array.name: empty_screen_quotes
string-array.item: May your compass always point to adventure.
Leave a trail of footprints and a heart full of stories.
The road less traveled is calling.
Find your next adventure on the turn of a page.
Reading the world, one story at a time.
The best journeys happen with a book in your hand.
My favorite travel companion is a good story.
Lost in a book, and happy to be.
Let a book be your map.
Where will this story take you?
On a journey to find the edges of the world and the depths of a good book.
Every book is a new beginning.
